## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G39960](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G39960)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DJA5</u>
- **Gene Name:** DNA J protein A5
- **Description:**   Molecular chaperone Hsp40/DnaJ family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2140035
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
